thread.title: Jeremy Zamzow Joins Opero Energy as Vice President of Power Generation to Help Drive Next Phase of Growth

author: cnbc.com
title: Jeremy Zamzow Joins Opero Energy as Vice President of Power Generation to Help Drive Next Phase of Growth
text:
HOUSTON, April 12, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Audubon Companies, an EPC provider for the oil and gas industry, announced today that Jeremy Zamzow has been promoted to Executive Vice President of Power Generation for its affiliate company, Opero Energy, a global leader in engineered module fabrication and provider of gas processing and treating technologies for the oil and gas industry. Zamzow brings over 10 years’ experience in energy finance, accounting, economics, energy risk management, and power generation operations.
Jeremy Zamzow appointed as Vice President of Power Generation
In his new role, Zamzow will oversee the company’s power generation business and provide leadership and strategic support as Opero Energy expands into the power generation market.
“With Jeremy’s arrival, I am delighted at this addition to Opero Energy’s team,” said Manish Mehta, President of Opero Energy. “Jeremy joins an already strong and diversified leadership team that is focused on creating value for our customers through operational excellence. His knowledge of distributed power plant projects, particularly his work in value chain development and improving the business climate in the power generation sector, aligns with Opero Energy’s overall mission.”
Most recently, Zamzow worked as Vice President of Finance and Corporate Controller at Audubon Companies, where he will maintain a dual role supporting the company's financial strategy and capital planning initiatives.
On his appointment, Jeremy Zamzow, commented: “This is an exciting opportunity to take a growing business to the next level. The pace of transformation that Opero Energy has accomplished in such a short period of time has been remarkable and I’m proud to be part of this forward-thinking team."
Zamzow earned a Master of Business Administration (MBA) in energy finance from the University of Houston and is a Certified Public Accountant in the state of Texas.

About Audubon Companies:

Equipped with experience and talent, Audubon Companies’ four affiliates –Audubon Engineering Solutions, Audubon Field Solutions, Opero Energy, and Affinity – deliver innovative and flexible solutions for repeatable project success – safely, on-schedule, and within budget.
